thread.section_title: Louison Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Tres chic and comfy, warm and welcoming
thread.title_full: Tres chic and comfy, warm and welcoming - Review of Louison Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kramey
title: Tres chic and comfy, warm and welcoming
text:
I am very pleased to have selected this hotel for our stay in Paris. Location is good, with major metro/train lines nearby. Staff was helpful and welcoming. The rooms are on the small side, but nicely arranged with everything we needed,(including a corkscrew!)
Definitely would recommend if you're looking for a cozy, affordable place in Paris.
